feature.label: Open Dataflow Plugin
feature.description: Open Dataflow Project plugin V1.2.5 * improved simulation speed * Action priority analysis bug fixed * NL parsing bug fixed (type parameters) V1.2.4 * Reverted to Java 1.5 V1.2.3 =============================================== * Improved console I/O behavior * Minor bug fixes V1.2.0 =============================================== * Improved simulator interface * Run config dialog tab for console I/O control * Improved error reporting from editor V1.1.0 =============================================== * make dataflow simulator available from the std Eclipse run dialog. * fix problems opening files outside project V1.0.1 =============================================== * Improved outlining including icons and preservation of expanded state. * Changed .CAL and .NL images. * Added to PDF documentation.
